title: The Man Who Fixes the World's Finest Violins
excerpt: He’s trusted to repair some of the world’s most fabled — and expensive — instruments. How does John Becker manage to unlock the sound of a Stradivarius?

title: A Hypnotic Look at How Japanese Samurai Swords Are Made
excerpt: Paper, books, wooden joints, tea whisks — Japanese culture has, for seemingly all of its long recorded history, greatly esteemed the making of objects.
